title: [Self-directed] Problem-Solving-Centered Assessment Design for Enhancing Managerial Competencies in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory Instructional Design and Assessment Theory, Scientific Research Methodology Understanding
context.additional_context: Targets science industry managers, focusing on enhancing practical assessment skills within limited timeframes, with mobile devices enabling flexible learning environments

learning_goals: Measuring the effectiveness of science education programs using a problem-solving-centered evaluation framework
Providing actionable recommendations for instructional design improvements based on assessment results

Learners can establish three project evaluation strategies within two weeks under resource-constrained environments (time/budget), and prepare reports demonstrating cost-saving effects (minimum 15%) and feasibility (meeting 4 out of 5 checklist items) for each strategy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
